name: whois
content:
Hello,
My name is Rachdi Sami, 33 yo, code monkey, passionate learner, python enjoyer and a fullstack web developer.
I love coding in Javascript, Typescript, Java, C++, Rust and Python, and have worked with frameworks like Angular, React, Vue and Django.
I amm always open for freelance work, just send me a message to rachdi.sami@gmail.com.
